title: If I Were Going, The Alice and Jerry Books
description: This book is the Basic Third Reader of the Alice and Jerry Basic Reading Program: In IF I WERE GOING, Mr. Sanders collects pictures of places he would like to see from all over the world.Sections include:Across The Sea in PicturesIt Happened in NorwayIt Happened in LaplandIt Happened in EnglandVisitors From Across the SeaIt Happened in BrittanyThe Fete of the Blue NetsIt Happened in SpainThe Birthday CandleIt Happened in AfricaThe Adventures of AliIf I Were Going Again
author: Mabel O'Donnell
